title: 159. Andy & DJ CTI: Gun Safety, New Planet & Halloween Homophobia?
itunes:title: 159. Andy & DJ CTI: Gun Safety, New Planet & Halloween Homophobia?
description: Karma has no menu. You get served what you deserve. In today's Andy & DJ Cruise The Internet episode, they discuss cinematographer Halyna Hutchins death after a fully loaded gun was handed to Alec Baldwin, how Michael Myers killing gay people has been interpreted as homophobic and Floyd Mayweather's strong supportive message to Kyrie Irving.
